#!/usr/bin/env python3
"""
Script to reproduce the separability matrix issue with nested CompoundModels.
"""

import numpy as np
from astropy.modeling import models as m
from astropy.modeling.separable import separability_matrix

def test_separability_issue():
    """Test the separability matrix issue with nested compound models."""
    
    print("=== Reproducing Separability Matrix Issue ===\n")
    
    # Test 1: Simple compound model (should work correctly)
    print("Test 1: Simple compound model")
    cm = m.Linear1D(10) & m.Linear1D(5)
    print(f"cm = m.Linear1D(10) & m.Linear1D(5)")
    print(f"separability_matrix(cm):")
    result1 = separability_matrix(cm)
    print(result1)
    print(f"Expected: diagonal matrix [[True, False], [False, True]]")
    print(f"Correct: {np.array_equal(result1, np.array([[True, False], [False, True]]))}\n")
    
    # Test 2: Extended compound model (should work correctly)  
    print("Test 2: Extended compound model")
    extended = m.Pix2Sky_TAN() & m.Linear1D(10) & m.Linear1D(5)
    print(f"extended = m.Pix2Sky_TAN() & m.Linear1D(10) & m.Linear1D(5)")
    print(f"separability_matrix(extended):")
    result2 = separability_matrix(extended)
    print(result2)
    expected2 = np.array([
        [True,  True, False, False],
        [True,  True, False, False], 
        [False, False, True, False],
        [False, False, False, True]
    ])
    print(f"Expected:")
    print(expected2)
    print(f"Correct: {np.array_equal(result2, expected2)}\n")
    
    # Test 3: Nested compound model (this should fail - the bug)
    print("Test 3: Nested compound model (THE BUG)")
    nested = m.Pix2Sky_TAN() & cm
    print(f"nested = m.Pix2Sky_TAN() & cm  (where cm = m.Linear1D(10) & m.Linear1D(5))")
    print(f"separability_matrix(nested):")
    result3 = separability_matrix(nested)
    print(result3)
    print(f"Expected (same as Test 2):")
    print(expected2)
    print(f"Correct: {np.array_equal(result3, expected2)}")
    
    if not np.array_equal(result3, expected2):
        print("❌ BUG CONFIRMED: Nested compound model shows incorrect separability!")
        print("The last two rows should be [False, False, True, False] and [False, False, False, True]")
        print("But they show [False, False, True, True] and [False, False, True, True]")
    else:
        print("✅ No bug found - nested compound model works correctly")
        
    return result1, result2, result3, expected2

if __name__ == "__main__":
    test_separability_issue()
